item.title: Reflection: the BC Data Science Workshop
item.description: Summary This is a brief summary and some incomplete reflections from my time as the workshop TA for the 2017 BC Data Science Workshop. About The BC Data Science workshop was hosted August 9 – 25 in downtown Vancouver at UBC Robson Square, co-organized by myself, Brian Wetton and Lee Rippon from the IAM, with support from PIMS and SFU Mathematics. The workshop featured a wide array of material from experts across the west coast, structured into three sections: a 3-day pre-workshop intensive; a week of introductory material; and a week-long data science project led by industry mentors.
